column6: The X-Men (re-united with Storm) take to the tunnels to discover why the Morlocks have been erupting with violence.  It ain't going to be pretty.  Also, Professor X goes off in search of a VERY IMPORTANT character from X-History.
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Jason Keith | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
